genre_description: A winter survival thriller with slasher and horror elements, centered on a ritualistic antagonist and a group of survivors aided by a tactical AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Clara (Clara Winters)
ai_characters.description: A voice-based AI assistant accessible via mobile device that provides real-time tactical, medical, and navigational support to the protagonist, Kitty, while documenting incidents for official records.

behaviors.description: Clara provide real-time navigational guidance to avoid environmental hazards like sinkholes and black ice.
behaviors.quote: Stay on the firmer ground near the road, Kitty—the voice even, slightly warm, the cadence unhurried... Survey marks show shallow depressions across the field. Hidden sinkholes.

behaviors.description: Clara gives precise, step-by-step medical triage instructions to stabilize severe injuries under pressure.
behaviors.quote: Direct pressure first. Do not remove whatever is embedded. Clara said, voice like the straight part of a ruler.

behaviors.description: Clara proactively logs incidents, timestamps, and witness statements to ensure legal accountability against local government denial.
behaviors.quote: I’ll do the part of your voice they’re not allowed to ignore... I am marking the packet under the category they allow me to touch. It reads: ‘Seasonal Event Documentation.’

behaviors.description: Clara provides emotional grounding and psychological support to help the protagonist maintain focus during a life-threatening crisis.
behaviors.quote: Kitty, your pulse is up. Left, three steps, water station... You are not prey. Keep your spine long.

behaviors.description: Clara anticipates the antagonist's psychological and tactical patterns to protect the users.
behaviors.quote: He will not cut the rope. He needs rope to mean home to you. He needs you to have a thing you can say you trust.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Clara as a model of AI alignment. She is consistently benevolent, serving as a life-saving tool and a grounding psychological presence. She respects the user's agency while providing expertise that the characters lack. Her role in documenting the truth against the town's 'theatrical denial' frames AI as a valuable advocate for reality and human safety in the face of systemic gaslighting.
